TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute Inherits AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: 指定附加属性只能供从指定类型派生的元素浏览。

span.span: Specifies that an attached property is browsable only for elements that derive from a specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的说明中使用的术语的含义 `browsable` 与为 提供的说明类似，但附加属性的可浏览状态特别与 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]的属性信息相关，因为附加属性主要是 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 的概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. 如果为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]指定了多个类型，则当任何指定的类型与（逻辑或）匹配时，属性将可浏览。If more than one type is specified for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], the property is browsable if any specified type matches (logical or). 类型也可以是接口。The type can also be an interface. 此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 指定 `true`。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies `true`. 此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 应该只应用于附加属性定义的 get 访问器。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. 请勿将此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 应用于 set 访问器。Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. 虽然直观地说，这是为相关元素 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 进行浏览的设置操作，但它是 get 访问器在控制真正行为的属性定义元素上的存在和特性。Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior. 有关声明附加属性的常规信息，请参阅[附加属性概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview)。For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现支持由此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]公开的一个可设置值的值相等性 。This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现支持多个可能的哈希值，这些值基于由此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]（）公开的一个可能的可设置值。This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

summary.span: 获取基类型，该类型设定此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 应用的附加属性的使用范围。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅可通过 构造函数公开的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 声明设置此属性。This property is settable only via the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declaration as exposed by the constructor.

summary.span: 获取此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的唯一类型标识符。

span.span: Gets a unique type identifier for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

value.span: 一个对象，表示 的唯一标识符。

span.span: An object that is a unique identifier for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现为每个 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]返回唯一值，这是必需的，因为此 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 允许多种用法。This implementation returns a unique value for each [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], which is necessary because this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] allows multiple usages.
